A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many people have posted reviews on this... so I won't waste my breath here. I had low expectations going in\, and left very disappointed. Frankly\, it's a hot mess as a movie\, and I'm speaking not as a huge fan of Star Wars. It's visually beautiful\, but the plot is like Swiss cheese. I fell asleep a couple of times. Leia's \"Space Mary Poppins\" moment was cringe-inducing.
